quotes.text: I have no special talent. I am only passionately curious.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: If you judge people, you have no time to love them.
quotes.author: Mother Theresa

quotes.text: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.text: Keby že mám spáchať samovraždu, skočím z tvojho ega na tvoje IQ.
quotes.author: Jano Gordulič

quotes.text: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.
quotes.author: Hellen Keller

quotes.text: Rozum, čo neskoro prišiel mohol aj v riti ostať.
quotes.author: Babka Hájnikova

quotes.text: Volakedy eletrika nebola, a kerá bola, aj tá trásla.
quotes.author: Katarína Koľníková
